ref: 3597 krúñca m. ʻ a kind of snipe or curlew ʼ, kruñc -- , nom. kruṅ m. VS. 2. krauñcá -- m. ʻ curlew ʼ TS., ʻ osprey ʼ lex., ˚cī -- f. Mn., krōñca -- m. BHSk. [Onom. EWA i 279, but perh. from crooked flight of the snipe conn. √kruñc]
